title: ID English Provender font
content:
Hope I have this right! Could anyone suggest what this font is or a similar font? Much appreciate any help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [epc-logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014183856/http:/typophile.com/files/epc-logo.png) | 7.37 KB |
author: AliD2106

comments.content: my immediate thought is: handwritten. none of the repeaters match.
Thank you! I thought it might be but looking for something similar to this to use in a logo so hoped there might be something out there!
